languages.text: "Я не успела поблагодарить вас за спасение на станции. Столь много горестного пепла покрыло мои мысли в момент, когда сердце Теобальда остановилось. Но вы поступили {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}благородно{/d} и не воспользовались моим плачевным положением. И за то я безмерно благодарна".

traits.locale_text: "Я не успела поблагодарить вас за спасение на станции. Столь много горестного пепла покрыло мои мысли в момент, когда сердце Теобальда остановилось. Но вы поступили благородно и не воспользовались моим плачевным положением. И за то я безмерно благодарна".

languages.text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."
languages.original_text: "Я не успела поблагодарить вас за спасение на станции. Столь много горестного пепла покрыло мои мысли в момент, когда сердце Теобальда остановилось. Но вы поступили {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}благородно{/d} и не воспользовались моим плачевным положением. И за то я безмерно благодарна".

traits.locale_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted honourably and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

"I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted honourably and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

"I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted honourably and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

"I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted honourably and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

languages.text: “我还没有感谢你在星站上救了我一命。当西奥巴德的心脏停止跳动时，我的思绪被笼罩在哀恸的灰烬之中，但你做出了{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}光荣{/d}之举，你并没有趁机利用我悲惨的境遇。为此，我对你无比感激。”
languages.original_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

traits.locale_text: “我还没有感谢你在星站上救了我一命。当西奥巴德的心脏停止跳动时，我的思绪被笼罩在哀恸的灰烬之中，但你做出了光荣之举，你并没有趁机利用我悲惨的境遇。为此，我对你无比感激。”

languages.text: 「ステーションであたくしを救ってくれたことに、まだお礼を言っていませんでしたわね。シオボールドの心臓が止まったとき、あたくしの思考は多くの悲痛な灰で曇っておりました。それでも、陛下は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}名誉{/d}ある行動をとり、惨めな立場にあるあたくしから搾取することはありませんでした。そのことに、計り知れないほどの感謝を抱いています」
languages.original_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションで私を救ってくれたことに、まだお礼を言っていませんでしたね。テオバルトの心臓が止まったとき、私の思考は多くの悲痛な灰で曇っていました。それでも、あなたは名誉ある行動をとり、惨めな立場にある私から搾取することはありませんでした。そのことに、私は計り知れないほどの感謝を抱いています」

「ステーションであたくしを救ってくれたことに、まだお礼を言っていませんでしたわね。シオボールドの心臓が止まったとき、あたくしの思考は多くの悲痛な灰で曇っておりました。それでも、陛下は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}名誉{/d}ある行動をとり、惨めな立場にあるあたくしから搾取することはありませんでした。そのことに、計り知れないほどの感謝を抱いています」

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch noch nicht für meine Rettung auf der Station gedankt. Meine Gedanken waren von so viel Trauer umwölkt, als Theobalds Herz nicht mehr schlug, aber Ihr habt {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}ehrenhaft{/d} gehandelt und meine missliche Lage nicht ausgenutzt. Und dafür bin ich Euch unsagbar dankbar."
languages.original_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch noch nicht für meine Rettung auf der Station gedankt. Meine Gedanken waren von so viel Trauer umwölkt, als Theobalds Herz nicht mehr schlug, aber Ihr habt ehrenhaft gehandelt und meine missliche Lage nicht ausgenutzt. Und dafür bin ich Euch unsagbar dankbar."

languages.text: « Je voulais vous remercier de m'avoir sauvée sur la station. Lorsque le cœur de Théobald s'est arrêté, mes pensées ont été obscurcies par un funeste nuage de cendres, mais vous avez fait preuve de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}noblesse{/d} en n'exploitant pas ma position de faiblesse. Et pour cela, je vous suis infiniment reconnaissante. »
languages.original_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais vous remercier de m'avoir sauvée sur la station. Lorsque le cœur de Théobald s'est arrêté, mes pensées ont été obscurcies par un funeste nuage de cendres, mais vous avez fait preuve de noblesse en n'exploitant pas ma position de faiblesse. Et pour cela, je vous suis infiniment reconnaissante. »

languages.text: «Aún no le he dado las gracias por salvarme en la estación. Mis pensamientos estaban nublados por las cenizas del pesar cuando el corazón de Theobald se detuvo, y sin embargo eligió {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}no aprovecharse{/d} de mi posición de debilidad. Mi gratitud no tiene límites».
languages.original_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

traits.locale_text: «Aún no le he dado las gracias por salvarme en la estación. Mis pensamientos estaban nublados por las cenizas del pesar cuando el corazón de Theobald se detuvo, y sin embargo eligió no aprovecharse de mi posición de debilidad. Mi gratitud no tiene límites».

languages.text: "İstasyonda beni kurtardığın için sana henüz teşekkür etmedim. Theobald'ın kalbi durduğunda zihnim büyük bir matem ve kül ile bulanmıştı ancak sen {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}şerefli{/d} bir davranış sergileyerek o âciz durumumdan faydalanmadın. Bu yüzden sana minnetim sonsuzdur."
languages.original_text: "I have not yet thanked you for saving me on the station. My thoughts were clouded with so much mournful ash when Theobald's heart stopped, but you acted {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenAmicable}honourably{/d} and did not exploit me in my wretched position. And for that I am immeasurably grateful."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyonda beni kurtardığın için sana henüz teşekkür etmedim. Theobald'ın kalbi durduğunda zihnim büyük bir matem ve kül ile bulanmıştı ancak sen şerefli bir davranış sergileyerek o âciz durumumdan faydalanmadın. Bu yüzden sana minnetim sonsuzdur."
